---
name: Bug Report
about: You're experiencing an issue with zeeksuite that is different than the documented (or expected) behavior.
labels: bug
---

When filing a bug, please include the following headings if possible. Any
example text in this template can be deleted.

#### Overview of the Issue

A paragraph or two about the issue you're experiencing.

#### Reproduction Steps

Steps to reproduce this issue

### Zeeksuite version

From `packer version`

### Diag output from `zeekctl diag`


### Operating system and Environment details

OS, Architecture, and any other information you can provide about the
environment.

### Log Fragments and crash.log files

Include appropriate log fragments. If the log is longer than a few dozen lines,
please include the URL to the [gist](https://gist.github.com/) of the log or
use the [Github detailed format](https://gist.github.com/ericclemmons/b146fe5da72ca1f706b2ef72a20ac39d) instead of posting it directly in the issue.

Set the extra_args `-vvvvv` for maximum log detail.
